Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.lab5

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Launcher
    This class provides methods relevant to launching the ball
    LightLocalizer
    This class performs localization using the right color sensor to locate and position the robot to the north with angle 0.
    Main
    This class combines all other classes together to perform the sequence of tasks required to complete the final project.
    NaviAvoid
    This class provides the same methods as the navigation class, such as travelTo, turnTo and distance conversions, except that the travelTo method has obstacle avoidance
    Navigation
    This class provides other classes with methods relevant for navigation, such as travelTo, turnTo and distance conversions.
    Odometer
    This class implements an Odometer thread, which updates the robot's X, Y and theta coordinates as it moves.
    OdometerCorrection
    This class contains methods to correct the odometer readings, more specifically the theta error.
    Resources
    Integrate this carefully with your existing Resources class (See below for where to add your code from your current Resources file).
    Resources.Point
    Represents a coordinate point on the competition map grid.
    Resources.Region
    Represents a region on the competition map grid, delimited by its lower-left and upper-right corners (inclusive).
    UltrasonicLocalizer
    This class performs localization using the ultrasonic sensor to locate and position the robot to an approximation of the north angle.
    UltrasonicPoller
    This class provides method to poll the current value read by the ultrasonic sensor.
